pages.body:
# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/kindlyfire.bit/?Post:9:Running+a+ZeroProxy)*. You can also install [[AWS Shadow Socks]].

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit), but it is outdated.

## List of working proxies

- https://bit.surf:43110/ (replacing https://bit.no.com:43110/)
- https://www.zerogate.tk/ (Adding new sites is disabled)
- https://zeronet.maxweiss.io/
- https://alilialili.ga/
- https://fuckcf.cf/ ((Qualys SSL Labs grade A+) + HSTS Preload, TLS 1.3 or QUIC)
- https://zn.maly.io/
- https://zeroml.ml/ (Can also proxy Freenet)
- http://cvhb5yx2qdclb76m.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])

## List of meta proxies

What's meta proxy? See [this post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1M4Ab8CUu3byziHVvNXLHmPezC4Lg9hvNJ)

- https://zero.acelewis.com/
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KSAMg1UFuUa17do6uSBni5jpNt9wsYrP6

## List of broken proxies

***These proxies do not work anymore.***

- https://zeronet.korso.win/ (FileServer Error, Certificate expired)
- https://proxy1.zeronet.functor.xyz/ or https://proxy1.zeronet.functor.xyz:10443/ (IPv4 and IPv6 with TLSv1.2 + modern FS ciphers only (Qualys SSL Labs grade A) + HSTS + secure cookies) (Certificate expired)
- https://zero.arukascloud.io/
- https://0netproxy.ml/
- https://0proxy.ml/
- https://proxy.th3nd.com/ ([proxy2](https://proxy2.th3nd.com/) \ [proxy3](https://proxy3.th3nd.com/) \ [proxy4](https://proxy4.th3nd.com/) \ [proxy5](https://proxy5.th3nd.com/)) 
- https://zeronet.iikb.org/
- http://zero.btnova.org/
- https://onlyzero.net/ (and https://onlyzero.net:43110/ )
- http://zerowrohotccypak.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- https://proxy1.zn.kindlyfire.me/ (http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:12_1FTFKztuv4Z5uy6iS83k9hB2xtS6yFnDxx/ZeroNet+proxy+proxy1+zn+kindlyfire+me+shutting+down)
- https://proxy2.zn.kindlyfire.me/
- http://wrewolf.com:43110/ (0.4.0, supports ZeroMe)
- http://proxy.zeroexpose.com/ (pron)
- http://zeroexposedcuclo.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zero.pags.to:43110/
- https://zeroproxy.atomike.ninja/
- http://zerobit.io:43110/
- http://epdb6k6hj4rttycg.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zeronet.crypt.cat:8080/
- https://www.zeropro.xyz/ (TLS certificate expired; removed on 2017-01-11; server down)
- http://wrewolf.com:43110/ (removed on 2017-01-11; 502 Bad Gateway from reverse nginx proxy)
- http://ampgb4cmyghof5rh.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])

# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/kindlyfire.bit/?Post:9:Running+a+ZeroProxy)*. You can also install [[AWS Shadow Socks]].

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit), but it is outdated.

## List of working proxies

- https://bit.surf:43110/ (replacing https://bit.no.com:43110/)
- https://www.zerogate.tk/ (Adding new sites is disabled)
- https://zeronet.maxweiss.io/

- https://zn.maly.io/

What's meta proxy? See [this post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1M4Ab8CUu3byziHVvNXLHmPezC4Lg9hvNJ)

- https://zero.acelewis.com/
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KSAMg1UFuUa17do6uSBni5jpNt9wsYrP6

## List of broken proxies

***These proxies do not work anymore.***

- https://zeronet.korso.win/ (FileServer Error, Certificate expired)
- https://proxy1.zeronet.functor.xyz/ or https://proxy1.zeronet.functor.xyz:10443/ (IPv4 and IPv6 with TLSv1.2 + modern FS ciphers only (Qualys SSL Labs grade A) + HSTS + secure cookies) (Certificate expired)

- https://proxy2.zn.kindlyfire.me/
- http://wrewolf.com:43110/ (0.4.0, supports ZeroMe)
- http://proxy.zeroexpose.com/ (pron)
- http://zeroexposedcuclo.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zero.pags.to:43110/
- https://zeroproxy.atomike.ninja/
- http://zerobit.io:43110/
- http://epdb6k6hj4rttycg.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zeronet.crypt.cat:8080/
- https://www.zeropro.xyz/ (TLS certificate expired; removed on 2017-01-11; server down)

# Welcome to ZeroNet

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]]. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet ?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]
- [[zerowikisandbox|Sandbox, you can play with it before editing other pages]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features
[[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*  

[华语版本](/1QDQ1NmFAfLE8GkUFwLFYXHwnrCaAkEr6V/) |  Deutsch  | [Français](/135qYXdNpf5kTWYuTJ8uautsUi91Bhvcck/) |  [Español](/1FwbupJhHcnFWGXuu3bn5VxcRVW9tx2tDQ) |  [Italiano](/121RPConrCLF4pu8uhKBnPHjyvhLhtJXr4/) |  [Português](/1QJ8rDLmn4CE2VXpMotAi7bDryRmNLM7Rm/) |  [Polski](/12Tt38zRJefsRMnAC9iai1CMSZ3PfiBDuY) | العربية | עברי  | [Русский](/1KKzUpPB2D533yKaiWA71GX44DUESsRhxU/)

# Welcome to ZeroWiki!

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]] and editable. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]
- [[zerowikisandbox|Sandbox, you can play with it before editing other pages]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features. [[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*

# Sandbox

Lorem ipsum dolorr aliquam.
Acbdefgh

    aaa
    aaa

![Testalt](127.0.0.1:43110/0chan.bit/data/users/1CNiX9xPnDGd9wAVyFdmJAq6cz1gpRkcpn/14fcaffd069e763fe659509301ae8bde.jpg "Test")ff

to kewl or not to kewl? 

already the wiki starts bullshitting everyone about the Holohoax.

-- bwoi torrent search & social network coming soon, bwoivideo cancelled (technical limitations)

[Testing references][1]. That link should lead to the ref at the bottom of the page.


  test
   test
   test


***
Using References:

[id]: http://example1.com/  "Optional Title1 Here"
[style]: http://example2.com/  "Optional Title2 Here"

- [[Ring]]

This is [an example] [id] reference-[style] link.  
The reference links can appear anywhere in the document.  

[1]: http://example3.com/  "Optional Title3 Here"
[1]: This is a reference.
***

I am in need of funding. :c

I get 10 times more traffic from [Google] [1] than from
[Yahoo] [2] or [MSN] [3].

  [1]: http://google.com/        "Google"
  [2]: http://search.yahoo.com/  "Yahoo Search"
  [3]: http://search.msn.com/    "MSN Search"

---
test
`test`
`**test**`
```
**test**
test
```

# Welcome to ZeroWiki !

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]] and editable. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features. [[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*

# Welcome to ZeroWiki !

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]] and editable. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/kindlyfire.bit/?Post:9:Running+a+ZeroProxy)*.

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit).

## List of working proxies

- https://proxy1.zn.kindlyfire.me/
- https://proxy2.zn.kindlyfire.me/
- https://bit.no.com:43110/
- http://wrewolf.com:43110/ ( 0.4.0+, supports ZeroMe)
- https://www.zeropro.xyz/ (TLS certificate expired)
- http://zerowrohotccypak.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])

## List of meta proxies

What's meta proxy? See [this post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1M4Ab8CUu3byziHVvNXLHmPezC4Lg9hvNJ)

- https://zero.acelewis.com/

## List of broken proxies

***These proxies do not work anymore.***

- http://proxy.zeroexpose.com/
- http://zeroexposedcuclo.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zero.pags.to:43110/
- https://zeroproxy.atomike.ninja/
- http://zerobit.io:43110/
- http://epdb6k6hj4rttycg.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zeronet.crypt.cat:8080/
